long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to send tabs between your devices. Simply right click on any page, and select "Send tab to device", followed by whichever device you'd like to send it to.
You need to set up each device you'd like to work with, simply by giving them a device name.
